table.caption: Table 179 — Line ending styles
head: Name
Appearance
Description
rows: A square filled with the annotation’s interior colour, if any
A circle filled with the annotation’s interior colour, if any
A diamond shape filled with the annotation’s interior colour, if any
Two short lines meeting in an acute angle to form an open arrowhead
Two short lines meeting in an acute angle as in the OpenArrow style and connected by a third line to form a triangular closed arrowhead filled with the annotation’s interior colour, if any
(PDF 1.5) A short line at the endpoint perpendicular to the line itself
(PDF 1.5) Two short lines in the reverse direction from OpenArrow
(PDF 1.5) A triangular closed arrowhead in the reverse direction from ClosedArrow
(PDF 1.6) A short line at the endpoint approximately 30 degrees clockwise from perpendicular to the line itself
